issue.title: [CF 255] Lua error-.-need long title
issue.body:
version:r147
If not in config mode, switch talent will get this error.

1x TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r147.lua:1136: attempt to index local "icon" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r147.lua:1136: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1105>

Locals:


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #255 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

I know why the bug was introduced, but unable to reproduce. Try r148 and let me know if it is fixed.

Edited Jul 8, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Version r148 is same (all character get this error.)

I try to edit all spell name to spell ID for icon of Primary Spec, and fixed lua error for Primary Spec switch to Secondary Spec.
Secondary Spec switch to Primary Spec still get that lua error.
I keep all icon of Secondary Spec with spell name, hope this can help you to find where is lua error.

Edited Jul 8, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Should be fixed now.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

:D /massage
Fixed in r149


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl
